interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SimpliGrown Bath Co. Pure Cornstarch Talc-Free Baby Powder with Aloe, Vitamins C & B5, Fragrance Free, 4 Oz
Review Date: 2020/12/08
Store: SIMPLIGROWN
Product Description: ['SimpliGrown Bath Co. knows that you take your baby/toddler seriously, and honestly, we do too. That\'s why our foaming hand soaps, baby wash, baby shampoo, baby conditioner, baby lotion, baby oil, baby powder, and bottle/dish soaps have the best certified organic ingredients and pure essential oil. So every "body" in your family can be safe and clean. Formulated for babies with sensitive skin,this baby powder won\'t irritate the skin. Pediatrician tested and recommended, free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, pthlates, and SLS. Leaping Bunny certified, vegan, gluten-free, and never tested on animals. So honest, we\'ve listed all ingredients on the label! So whether you\'re using with our other SimpliGrown products or just using this baby powder, you will be happy that you have this product in your house.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SIMPLIGROWN', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Material Feature': 'Vega, Organic, Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SGBC-BP500-06', 'UPC': '087508176123', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/KI6XB', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: I bought this because I needed something talc and fragrance free. I pay careful attention to what I use on my body and a lot of baby powders have a lot of not so good ingredients. This is a cleaner brand and I would use it again!
Review Title: Cleaner ingredients
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Caudalie Favorites Set {'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.54 x 2.05 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2346203'} I am a big fan of caudalie products. This is a mini size kit and is perfect for travel. There are five products in this kit. I have sensitive skin and I always trust caudalie! Plus, the products always have a pleasant smell. Favorite No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'} I really like this face wash. I've used it just in my hands to wash my face really quickly, and I've also used it with my facial cleansing brush to get a deeper clean. It smells amazing. It has a thicker consistency and lathers, which I really like because it makes my face feel extra clean. Would buy this again! Would repurchase! LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'} This has a great smell but I found the product was too thin for my damaged hair. I prefer a thicker hair cream spray. If you’re looking for a very light spray, you may enjoy this product. Not thick enough Caudalie Vinosource SOS Intense Hydration Set: Hydrating Trio for Sensitive Skin including a Daily Foam Cleanser, Hydrating Serum, Facial Moisturizer {'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 5.35 x 2.64 inches; 14.5 Ounces'} I’ve used this brand for years so I was excited to find this value pack! The packaging is beautiful and could make a nice Christmas gift. This is a great starter set to introduce someone to the brand. It comes with the cleanser, cream and serum. All the products are high quality and have been on my go to list for years. This is an excellent value. Value pack Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow Karuna {'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 5.04 x 1.57 inches; 8.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '857950007333'} This is a really fun set and would make a good gift. It comes with 7 masks and lists what order to use them in. Varies from hydrating, brightening to clarifying masks.

These are all cloth masks and easy to use. After the week my skin did feel very well hydrated. This is a bit expensive for what it is, but is a fun splurge. 7 masks SimpliGrown Bath Co. Pure Cornstarch Talc-Free Baby Powder with Aloe, Vitamins C & B5, Fragrance Free, 4 Oz SIMPLIGROWN ['SimpliGrown Bath Co. knows that you take your baby/toddler seriously, and honestly, we do too. That\'s why our foaming hand soaps, baby wash, baby shampoo, baby conditioner, baby lotion, baby oil, baby powder, and bottle/dish soaps have the best certified organic ingredients and pure essential oil. So every "body" in your family can be safe and clean. Formulated for babies with sensitive skin,this baby powder won\'t irritate the skin. Pediatrician tested and recommended, free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, pthlates, and SLS. Leaping Bunny certified, vegan, gluten-free, and never tested on animals. So honest, we\'ve listed all ingredients on the label! So whether you\'re using with our other SimpliGrown products or just using this baby powder, you will be happy that you have this product in your house.'] {'Brand': 'SIMPLIGROWN', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Material Feature': 'Vega, Organic, Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SGBC-BP500-06', 'UPC': '087508176123', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/KI6XB', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} I bought this because I needed something talc and fragrance free. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Preference**: The user maintains a strong inclination towards Caudalie products and actively seeks value sets to introduce others to the brand. They remain receptive to high-quality offerings from brands such as Higher Education Skincare and enjoy exploring a variety of skincare sets.

- **Skin Sensitivity**: Prioritizes products suitable for sensitive skin, demonstrating a commitment to gentle and safe ingredients. This focus extends beyond skincare to personal care products for oneself and family.

- **Product Formulation**: Enjoys liquid formulations for cleansing efficiency but has developed a preference for thicker hair care textures, indicating a thoughtful and varied approach to formulations across different categories.

- **Convenience**: Values travel-friendly sizes and aesthetically pleasing packaging, which suggests a lifestyle that appreciates portability and gift-worthy presentation.

- **Fragrance**: Prefers unscented products, particularly those designed for sensitive skin, highlighting the importance of safety and sensory enjoyment in their beauty regimen.

- **Quality Standards**: Consistently selects high-quality products, favoring those with clean and organic ingredients. They recognize exceptional value in sets and kits.

- **Recent Interaction**: The user appreciates fun, practical sets that enhance their skincare routine, emphasizing a preference for clean, safe ingredients. They are open to splurging on products that offer enjoyable experiences, even if they come at a higher price point.

Overall, the user is health-conscious, focused on effective skincare and personal care products suitable for sensitive skin, while continuing to explore hair care with similar priorities. Their preferences balance performance, safety, and convenience in a thoughtful beauty regimen.
